metadata.title: CVE-2022-3595 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been rated asproblematic. Affected by this issue is the function sess_free_buffer of thefile fs/cifs/sess.c of the component CIFS Handler. The manipulation leadsto double free. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. Theidentifier of this vulnerability is VDB-211364.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
